articles.title: Sherman: I did nothing at the FFA... - FTBL Australia
articles.description: Former Football Federation Australia technical director Rob Sherman admits the role was so compromised by competing factions he could do nothing during his 10 months in the job.
articles.content:
Sherman shocked the football community by quitting in frustration less than a year after leaving Melbourne Victory to take up the powerful position.
But he admitted to the FTBL Year Zero podcast: "I would actually say I've done nothing since I've been in the… [+2713 chars]

articles.content:
